name: @tekdi/ngtek-social-ads
description: This is an Angular module to display remote ads from the Techjoomla [Social Ads extension](https://techjoomla.com/products/social-ads). You can learn more about remote ads and multi site ad delivery [here](https://techjoomla.com/socialads-3.1-documentation/multi-site-ad-delivery)
author: Tekdi Technologies
